thread.title: BRIEF-Hill International Receives NYSE Letter Granting Co's Request To Extend Listing

title: BRIEF-Hill International Receives NYSE Letter Granting Co's Request To Extend Listing

organizations.name: brief-hill international receives nyse letter granting co
request to extend listing reuters staff

text: February 16, 2018 / 12:00 PM / in 4 minutes BRIEF-Hill International Receives NYSE Letter Granting Co's Request To Extend Listing Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 16 (Reuters) - Hill International Inc: * HILL INTERNATIONAL-‍RECEIVED NYSE LETTER GRANTING CO‘S REQUEST TO EXTEND LISTING,WHICH EXPIRES ON JULY 16, 2018,TO FILE DELINQUENT FILINGS WITH SEC​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
